name: 3D Platformer (sefactn)
description:
This game is my first 3D Unity game. Therefore, you may encounter some bugs. 

 In this game, your goal is reach your girlfriend without dying. Your character is running automatically, you can use just  "A", "S", "D" Keys to move character. 

                  A -> To Left

                  S -> Stop

                  D -> To Right 

I wanted to use all the mechanics i know. I hope you enjoy this game trial.

A little advice: Be aware to snowballs!
